item.title: Code Documentation
item.description: Outline Link to heading Introduction General Terms Slideshow Link Workshop Write out entire presentation like a blog and link slideshow, workshop (git) Introduction Link to heading What is code documentation? Why do we need it? What are the best practices for strong code documentation? The following tutorial breaks down these questions and explores different techniques for effectively documentating code. View the complete slide deck at the bottom of this page.
